macros.macro: <#macro send_rule_fields> sbr.id AS 'id', sbr.business_type AS 'businessType', (SELECT sct.field_name FROM SMS_DICT_INFO sct WHERE sct.dict_type = 'SMS_BUS_TYPE' AND sct.field_value = sbr.business_type ) AS 'businessDesc', sbr.sms_channel AS 'smsChannel', sbr.free_send AS 'freeSend', sbr.enbaled AS 'enabled', </#macro>
<#macro black_list_fields> sb.id AS 'id', sb.company_id AS 'companyId', sb.store_id AS 'storeId', sb.is_effective AS 'effective', sb.is_disable AS 'disable', </#macro>

sql.body: SELECT <@black_list_fields /> <@crud_fixed_select "sb" /> FROM SMS_BLACKLIST AS sb
INSERT INTO SMS_BLACKLIST (id, company_id, is_effective, is_disable, store_id, tenant_id, creator) VALUES (:id,:companyId, :effective, :disable, :storeId, :tenantId, :creator)
REPLACE INTO SMS_BLACKLIST (id, company_id, store_id,is_effective, is_disable, tenant_id, creator ) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, -1, 1 )
UPDATE SMS_BLACKLIST SET is_disable = 1 WHERE id = :id AND company_id = :companyId
UPDATE SMS_BLACKLIST SET is_effective = 0 WHERE id = :id AND company_id = :companyId
UPDATE SMS_BLACKLIST SET is_effective = 1 WHERE id = :id AND company_id = :companyId
DELETE FROM SMS_BLACKLIST WHERE id = :id AND company_id = :companyId
INSERT INTO SMS_SEND_RULE (id, business_type, sms_channel, free_send, tenant_id, creator, createTime) VALUES (:id,:businessType, :smsChannel, :freeSend, -1, -1, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
SELECT <@send_rule_fields /> <@crud_fixed_select "sbr"/> FROM SMS_SEND_RULE AS sbr WHERE sbr.delete_flag = 0 AND sbr.enbaled = :enabled
UPDATE SMS_SEND_RULE SET enbaled = 0 WHERE id = :id

macros.macro: <#macro recharge_rule_fields> srr.id AS 'id', srr.unit_price AS 'unitPrice', srr.amount_range AS 'amountRange', srr.company_id AS 'companyId', srr.expired_date AS 'expiredDate', srr.remarks AS 'remarks', srr.enbaled AS 'enabled', srr.temporary AS 'temporary', srr.delete_flag AS 'deleteFlag', srr.tenant_id AS 'tenantId', srr.creator AS 'creator', srr.createTime AS 'createTime', srr.editor AS 'editor', srr.editTime AS 'editTime' </#macro>

sql.body: SELECT <@recharge_rule_fields /> FROM SMS_RECHARGE_RULES AS srr WHERE srr.delete_flag = 0 AND srr.temporary = 0
SELECT <@recharge_rule_fields /> FROM SMS_RECHARGE_RULES AS srr WHERE srr.delete_flag = 0 AND srr.id = :id

INSERT INTO SMS_RECHARGE_RULES ( id, unit_price, amount_range, company_id, remarks, expired_date, temporary, enbaled, tenant_id, creator, createTime) VALUES (:id, :unitPrice, :amountRange, :companyId, :remarks, :expiredDate, :temporary, 1, 100000, -1, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
UPDATE SMS_RECHARGE_RULES SET enbaled = :enabled, editor=-1, editTime=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id =:id

macros.macro: <#macro recharge_detail_fields> srd.id AS 'id', srd.company_id AS 'companyId', srd.store_id AS 'storeId', srd.store_ids AS 'storeIds', srd.recharge_scope AS 'rechargeScope', srd.recharge_type AS 'rechargeType', srd.rule_id AS 'ruleId', srd.recharge_amount AS 'amount', srd.total_quantity AS 'totalQuantity', srd.used_quantity AS 'usedQuantity', srd.delete_flag AS 'deleteFlag', </#macro>

sql.body: SELECT <@recharge_detail_fields /> <@crud_fixed_select "srd" /> FROM SMS_RECHARGE_DETAIL srd WHERE id = :id

INSERT INTO SMS_RECHARGE_DETAIL (id, company_id, store_id, store_ids, recharge_scope, recharge_type, rule_id, recharge_amount, total_quantity, tenant_id, creator) VALUES (:id,:companyId, :storeId, :storeIds, :rechargeScope, :rechargeType, :ruleId, :amount, :totalQuantity , :tenantId, :creator)

INSERT INTO SMS_RECHARGE_DETAIL (id, company_id, store_id, store_ids, recharge_scope, recharge_type, rule_id, recharge_amount, total_quantity, tenant_id, creator) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? , ?, ?)
INSERT INTO SMS_RECHARGE_DEDUCTION_DETAIL (id, recharge_id, deduction_id, record_id, finish_flag,creator, createTime) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

SELECT <@recharge_detail_fields /> <@crud_fixed_select "srd" /> FROM SMS_RECHARGE_DETAIL AS srd WHERE srd.recharge_type = 2 AND srd.recharge_scope = :rechargeScope AND srd.company_id = :companyId <#if (rechargeScope == 2)> AND srd.store_ids = :storeIds <#elseif (rechargeScope == 3)> AND srd.store_id = :storeId </#if> AND srd.id NOT IN ( SELECT ded.deduction_id FROM SMS_RECHARGE_DEDUCTION_DETAIL AS ded WHERE ded.finish_flag = 1)
UPDATE SMS_RECHARGE_DETAIL SET used_quantity = ? , editTime=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = ?

macros.macro: <#macro sms_balance_fields> smb.id AS 'id', smb.company_id AS 'companyId', smb.store_id AS 'storeId', smb.store_ids AS 'storeIds', smb.sms_balance AS 'balance', smb.group_name AS 'groupName', smb.recharge_scope AS 'rechargeScope', </#macro>

sql.body: SELECT <@sms_balance_fields /> <@crud_fixed_select "smb"/> FROM SMS_RECHARGE_BALANCE AS smb WHERE smb.company_id = :companyId AND smb.delete_flag = 0
SELECT <@sms_balance_fields /> <@crud_fixed_select "smb"/> FROM SMS_RECHARGE_BALANCE AS smb WHERE smb.company_id = :companyId AND smb.recharge_scope = :rechargeScope AND smb.delete_flag = 0
SELECT <@sms_balance_fields /> <@crud_fixed_select "smb"/> FROM SMS_RECHARGE_BALANCE AS smb WHERE smb.id IN (<#list balanceIds as id>'${id}'<#sep>,</#list>) AND smb.delete_flag = 0

SELECT <@sms_balance_fields /> <@crud_fixed_select "smb"/> FROM SMS_RECHARGE_BALANCE AS smb WHERE smb.company_id = :companyId AND smb.recharge_scope = :rechargeScope AND smb.store_id = :storeId <#if storeIds??> AND smb.store_ids = :storeIds </#if> AND smb.delete_flag = 0
UPDATE SMS_RECHARGE_BALANCE SET sms_balance = :balance, editTime=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = :id

INSERT INTO SMS_RECHARGE_BALANCE ( id, company_id, store_id, store_ids, recharge_scope, group_name, sms_balance, tenant_id ) VALUES (:id, :companyId, :storeId, :storeIds, :rechargeScope, :groupName, :balance, :tenantId )
INSERT INTO SMS_CHARGE_DETAIL (id, company_id, store_id, sms_batchno, blance_id, blance_num, deduction_num, tenant_id) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE SMS_CHARGE_DETAIL SET reimburse_num = ? WHERE id = ?

SELECT scd.id AS 'id', scd.company_id AS 'companyId', scd.store_id AS 'storeId', scd.sms_batchno AS 'smsBatchNo', scd.blance_id AS 'blanceId', scd.blance_num AS 'balanceNum', scd.deduction_num AS 'deductionNum', scd.reimburse_num AS 'reimburseNum', smb.recharge_scope AS 'rechargeScope', <@crud_fixed_select "scd" /> FROM SMS_CHARGE_DETAIL AS scd LEFT JOIN SMS_RECHARGE_BALANCE AS smb ON scd.blance_id = smb.id WHERE scd.sms_batchno IN (<#list smsBatchNos as batchNo>'${batchNo}'<#sep>,</#list>) ORDER BY scd.sms_batchno DESC

INSERT INTO SMS_CHARGE_SUMMARY ( id, company_id, store_id, sms_batchno, business_type, free_send, company_name, sms_quantity, wx_quantity, store_name, send_mode, sms_context, finish_send, tenant_id, createTime ) VALUES (:id, :companyId, :storeId, :smsBatchNo, :businessType, :freeSend, :companyName, :smsQuantity, :wxQuantity, :storeName, :sendMode, :smsContext, :finishSend, :tenantId, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

SELECT scs.id AS 'id', scs.company_id AS 'companyId', scs.store_id AS 'storeId', scs.sms_batchno AS 'smsBatchNo', scs.wx_quantity AS 'wxQuantity', scs.free_send AS 'freeSend', scs.business_type AS 'businessType', scs.send_mode AS 'sendMode', scs.finish_send AS 'finishSend', scs.sms_quantity AS 'smsQuantity', scs.sms_context AS 'smsContext', scs.store_name AS 'storeName', scs.company_name AS 'companyName', <@crud_fixed_select "scs" /> FROM SMS_CHARGE_SUMMARY AS scs WHERE scs.id = :id

SELECT stl.id AS 'id', stl.company_id AS 'companyId', stl.store_id AS 'storeId', stl.send_channel AS 'sendChannel', stl.weixin_id AS 'weixinId', stl.device_id AS 'deviceId', stl.job_id AS 'jobId', stl.member_id AS 'memberId', stl.free_send AS 'freeSend', stl.sms_enabled AS 'enabled', stl.sms_channel AS 'smsChannel', stl.businsess_type AS 'businessType', stl.send_batchno AS 'sendBatchNo', stl.send_status AS 'sendStatus', stl.phone_no AS 'phoneNum', stl.sms_count AS 'smsCount', stl.word_count AS 'wordCount', stl.member_name AS 'memberName', stl.sms_context AS 'smsContext', stl.send_res_code AS 'sendResCode', stl.send_local_date AS 'sendLocalDate', stl.remarks AS 'remarks', <@crud_fixed_select "stl" /> FROM SMS_TRANSPORT_LOG AS stl WHERE stl.send_status = 1 AND stl.send_batchno = :sendBatchNo AND stl.communication_channel = :communicationChannel

SELECT stl.id AS 'id', stl.send_status AS 'sendStatus', stl.final_state AS 'finalState', stl.final_state_date AS 'finalStateDate', stl.final_state_desc AS 'finalStateDesc' FROM SMS_TRANSPORT_LOG AS stl WHERE stl.send_status = 3 AND stl.final_state = 0 ORDER BY stl.createTime LIMIT :limit

SELECT stl.id AS 'id', stl.sms_count AS 'smsCount', stl.send_batchno AS 'sendBatchNo', stl.reimburse_state AS 'reimburseState', stl.reimburse_state_date AS 'reimburseDate', <@crud_fixed_select "stl" /> FROM SMS_TRANSPORT_LOG AS stl WHERE stl.send_status = 4 AND stl.free_send = 0 AND stl.communication_channel = 1 AND stl.reimburse_state = 0 AND stl.send_batchno = :sendBatchNo
UPDATE SMS_TRANSPORT_LOG SET reimburse_state = 1, reimburse_state_date = NOW() WHERE id IN (${ids?join(",")})

INSERT INTO yycomm.Send_MSG_List ( content, touser, `type`, isgroup, todeviceid, store_id, company_id, UUID,fromuser, recieveTime ,sendFlag, IDGroup, IDSort) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, NOW(), 0, ?, ?)
SELECT skw.id AS 'id', skw.key_word AS 'keyword', skw.enabled AS 'enabled', <@crud_fixed_select "skw" /> FROM SMS_KEY_WORDS AS skw
UPDATE SMS_KEY_WORDS SET enabled = :enabled WHERE id = :id
INSERT INTO SMS_KEY_WORDS (key_word, enabled, delete_flag, tenant_id, creator) VALUES (:keyword, :enabled, 0, 0, 0)

SELECT rec.id FROM acp.SMS_TRANSPORT_LOG rec WHERE rec.send_status = 3 AND rec.send_res_code = '0000' AND rec.final_state = 0 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR,rec.send_local_date,NOW()) <= 4 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,rec.send_local_date,NOW()) >= 10
UPDATE SMS_TRANSPORT_LOG SET send_status = 1 WHERE send_status = 0 AND send_channel = 2 AND sms_enabled = 1 AND send_batchno = :batchNo
SELECT stl.id,stl.sms_count,stl.send_status,stl.remarks FROM SMS_TRANSPORT_LOG AS stl WHERE stl.send_status = 0 AND stl.send_channel = 1 AND stl.sms_enabled = 1 AND stl.send_batchno = :batchNo

INSERT INTO SMS_TRANSPORT_BATCH (company_id, store_id, send_batchno, is_billing, sms_write_count, sms_write_ok_count, wx_write_count, wx_write_ok_count, delete_flag, tenant_id, creator) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, 0, ?, -1)

SELECT id, company_id, store_id, send_batchno, is_billing, sms_write_count, sms_write_ok_count, wx_write_count, wx_write_ok_count, delete_flag, tenant_id, creator, createTime, editor, editTime FROM acp.SMS_TRANSPORT_BATCH <#if (sql=="loadByBatchNo")> WHERE send_batchno = :batchNo </#if>
